text: Instruction— Effect Deseription Movs S.R R < SignExtend(s) Move with sign extension movsbu Move sign-extended byte to word movsbl Move sign-extended byte to double word movsvl Move sign-extended word to double word movsbq Move sign-extended byte to quad word movsvq Move sign-extended word to quad word movslq Move sign-extended double word to quad word cltq %rax — SignExtend(%eax) — Sign-extend %eax to 4rax
